text: Curly Sue is a 1991 American romantic comedy-drama movie. It is about a homeless man and his daughter who move from Detroit to Chicago. Alisan Porter plays Curly Sue. Kelly Lynch plays Grey. The movie received negative reviews from critics. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 comedy- drama movies Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Curly Sue
